name: Self Protection 101
description:
What do you do if someone tries to mug you? How do you react if you witnessed a robbery in progress? Can you survive a mass shooting? Experience is the best lesson, but you only get one life IRL. Don't waste it by making a stupid decision.

Make the right choices (or not) and learn some lessons along the way.

  • Self defense scenarios in the style of a visual novel

This game involves emotional themes and victimizing scenarios. You know what you're getting into. Don't play if you're easily offended. This is not made to be controversial, but to give a perspective about our world of unfortunate evergrowing hostility, and how to survive it. Wackadoo certified.
